page.title: 16Accident (2)
page.content: Stapleford Times of day:Most occur during the rush hour period 8 a.m. to 12 noon.There were Fewer after 4 p.m. Age and sex of drivers:Less evenly spread than in Little Shelford.Most were under 20, then the 30-40 age group.Out of 33 people involved,29 were male,4 female.1 driver was drunk Conditions:mostly dry and still;very few with icy or wet road. Seasons:Most in winter;then spring and summer with beach and 5 in autumn. Cause:By far the most common was innatentive or negligent drivers-15;only 2 because of poor weather conditions.
